Contents.Content: --病人基本信息 select br.PATIENT_ID, br.NAME, br.SEX, br.DATE_OF_BIRTH, br.ID_NO, br.MAILING_ADDRESS, ss.PAT_VID, ss.INP_NO, --住院号 ss.OPERATING_ROOM, ks.DEPT_NAME, ss.OPERATION_DATE, --手术时间 ss.SURGEON, --医生 ss.DIAG_BEFORE_OPERATION, --手术名称 ss.START_DATE_TIME, --手术开始时间 ss.END_DATE_TIME --手术结束时间 from Infecon_Patientinfo br left join infecon_operation ss on br.PATIENT_ID=substr(ss.PAT_VID,0,10) left join infecon_deptinfo ks on ss.DEPT_NAME=ks.DEPT_CODE where 1=1 {0}

select ss.PAT_VID, ss.OPERATING_ROOM, ks.DEPT_NAME, ss.OPERATION_DATE, --手术时间 ss.SURGEON, --医生 ss.DIAG_BEFORE_OPERATION, --手术名称 ss.START_DATE_TIME, --手术开始时间 ss.END_DATE_TIME --手术结束时间 from infecon_operation ss left join infecon_deptinfo ks on ss.DEPT_NAME=ks.DEPT_CODE where 1=1 {0}

select --病人基本信息 br.PATIENT_ID as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PATIENT_ID as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.NAME as NAME, --病人姓名 br.NAME as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.SEX as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.DATE_OF_BIRTH as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 --br.age as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.DEPT_NAME as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.bed_no as BEDNO --床位 from dbo.view_supply_patient_info br left join dbo.view_supply_zy_patient_info zy br.patient_id=zy.patient_id where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.PATIENT_ID as VALUE,--病人编号 br.NAME as NAME, --病人姓名 br.NAME as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.SEX as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.DATE_OF_BIRTH as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 --br.age as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.INP_NO as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.OPERATING_ROOM as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ks.DEPT_NAME as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.OPERATION_DATE as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.SURGEON as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.DIAG_BEFORE_OPERATION as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from Infecon_Patientinfo br inner join infecon_operation ss on br.PATIENT_ID=substr(ss.PAT_VID,0,10) left join infecon_deptinfo ks on ss.DEPT_NAME=ks.DEPT_CODE where 1=1 {0}

/*--病人挂号信息--*/ select br.PatientCode, --病人编号 br.PatientName, --姓名 br.MedicalRecordCode, --病历号 br.PatientSex, --性别 convert(datetime,br.PatientBirthday,120) as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 year(getdate())-substring(br.PatientBirthday,1,4) as PatientAge, --年龄 br.PatientIDCard, --身份证号 br.SocialSecurityCard, --社保卡号 br.PatientAddress, --地址 br.PatientPhone, --联系电话 br.HighRiskInfectivity, --是否具有高危
gh.RegisterCode, --挂号系统编号 gh.OutPatientEmergency, --挂号类型 convert(datetime,gh.RegisterDateTime,120) as RegisterDateTime, --挂号时间 gh.RegisterDepartment, --挂号科室 gh.RegisterNumber --挂号号 from View_Infecon_Patient br left join View_Infecon_Register gh on br.PatientCode=gh.PatientCode where 1=1 {0} order by convert(datetime,gh.RegisterDateTime,120) Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientSex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 convert(datetime,br.PatientBirthday,120) as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 year(getdate())-substring(br.PatientBirthday,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 gh.RegisterCode as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.OutPatientEmergency as OUTPATIENTEMERGENCY,--挂号类型 convert(datetime,gh.RegisterDateTime,120) as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 gh.RegisterNumber as REGISTERNUMBER --挂号序号 from View_Infecon_Patient br left join View_Infecon_Register gh on br.PatientCode=gh.PatientCode where 1=1 {0} order by convert(datetime,gh.RegisterDateTime,120) Desc
/*--根据工号查询登录人员信息--*/ select name from view_supply_employee where emp_sn=@emp_sn
